title: Verizon to Increase Unlimited Data Pricing by $20 in November (Updated)
text:
Verizon to Increase Unlimited Data Pricing by $20 in November (Updated) 
Published By: Droid-Life.com - Today 
Verizon is about to increase the price of your unlimited data plan, assuming you have held onto it for all these years. According to sources...
